snippet.title: A Therapist's Thoughts on Johnny and Amber's Audio Argument!
snippet.description:
I don’t generally keep up with Hollywood goings on, but when I listened to this audio of Johnny Depp and Amber Heard’s argument that came out Feb, I knew I wanted to share my thoughts on it.
This audio is a rare front row seat to so many of the games, manipulations and other traits of narcissists that we talk about all the time on this channel.  In this we can hear really profound examples of gaslighting, devaluing, love-bombing, tactics of anger, pressure, bullying, shifting to tears, victim-dance, and attacking from victim-stance, all of which combine to create and reinforce trauma-bonding.  Because all of this is caught on audio, I thought it could be very validating for so many of you who have been through this; to hear how crazy-making this is, to see how challenging these circular games are to navigate, and to hear how virtually ANYONE can get sucked into, and stuck in this type of toxic relationship.  The opportunity to talk about the games and tactics people with narcissistic traits play, with real live examples to refer to, just seemed invaluable.  So, I know this is a departure from my norm, but I think you’ll understand why in short order.
Here is the audio link if you want to listen;

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XiuUzvZMyro

So often I am asked if I can do individual sessions with viewers, and saying no, without any suggestions, is painful for me, and unhelpful for you. That's why I've partnered with Betterhelp as a way to get affordable, professional, online therapy.  BetterHelp can match you with a licensed therapist, who you can connect with by video conference, phone, text, or livechat. You'll be matched within 48 hours and if for any reason you'd like to switch counselors, you can do so completely free of charge right through the app. This is a worldwide service and financial aid is available. 
This is an affiliate link in which I may receive compensation from Betterhelp. Please let me know how it goes if you use this service!  Best to you all always, Shannon
 https://betterhelp.com/therapisttalks 
If you are in immediate crisis, please use this instead; http://www.crisitextline.org
#JusticeforJohnnyDepp,#AmberJohnnyCourtCase,#AmberHeard
